title: Afinidad Maravillosa - Pueblo Libre
description: Vegetarian restaurant of Asian cuisine, buffet style, located on the Avenida Brasil. Also has an a la carte menu. As of November 2014, each portion (rice with vegetables, fried noodles, beans, etc.) from the buffet costs 2 soles, with an optional special combo with 4 portions and a beverage for 7 soles. Knowledgeable about veganism and has plenty of vegan choices. A small retail shop carries biscuits, noodles and more.
